title: Italy Set to Spend €1.5B on Secure Comms Deal with SpaceX
summary:
Italy is currently in talks with SpaceX to finalise a €1.5 billion deal that would see the US-based company provide secure telecommunications services for civil and defence applications, Bloomberg reports. The deal will cover a period of five years and will include the supply of secure communications across the Mediterranean for the country’s Armed Forces. […]
